Author: mechanical_fish
Content:
Is there anyone reading this who has not read The Huff? You should!

And do not miss the link at the bottom of the parent article. Darrell Huff sounds like a fun guy. I may have to dig out his other books.

Author: utnick
Content:
I like your design, but the logo is kind of weak.

As for the concept, I can see the appeal of going to the site to make money from answering questions, but I don't think many people are going to pay to have their questions answered.

Maybe you could just keep asking your own questions and if monthly ad revenue > what you pay out for questions. You profit!

Author: naish
Content: It might be just me, but the name leads me to believe that these guys are just a bunch of stoners.  "Hey, what if we call our company 'Hashrocket'?" [takes, another hit off of the bong/pipe/spliff]  "Great idea, man...."

Author: ojbyrne
Content: I met Chris McKinstry in Winnipeg, Canada in 1995. I was not very impressed - he wanted to start a course on linux sysadmin  or something... - with me doing pretty well everything except collecting the money... and he couldn't even organize it properly. He struck me as a scammer, though obviously it's only a thin line between that and "Internet entrepreneur."
